name: Police Escape: Car Chase
description:
Take your police button, tackle crime and punish criminals!

Welcome to the crime city – you are police chief now! Get criminality under control, follow lawbreakers, return quite life to this town! Upgraded police car at your service – prove your racing skills in Police Escape: Car Chase 3D challenge. Turn on your police lights and police siren, let's go!

Some crime has happened – gangstars robed the bank or escaped from prison, it doesn’t matter, you have to catch them! Drive your car and crash into criminal cars. You'll win then their health indicator reaches zero.

Police Escape: Car Chase 3D game features:
• Real police car driving simulator;
• Criminal chase in 3D;
• Extremely addictive city racing;
• Easy-to-use control;
• Interesting gameplay.

Show police force to breakers in Police Escape: Car Chase 3D – drive your car, be fast and pitiless!
